title: Add voice chat plz

embed.description: All sorts of abuse was given to this yas...

body: I promise i wouldn't have flamed this yas with as much abuse as a single person could in the time frame it takes to mute someone.....

replies.body: Issue is why you're trying to 1v1 an xin as vi level 1.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0rdoznpr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-06T10:14:25.311+0000)
>
> Issue is why you're trying to 1v1 an xin as vi level 1.

Because my mid laner is in a prime position for the quicker rotation, 100% if the yas opened his eyes we would have won that and turned on their mid lane for the 2v1 if they followed.
